alert.note: Alert for Cedar; Johnson; Jones; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 11 at 5:25PM CDT until October 11 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CEDAR...NORTHEASTERN JOHNSON...SOUTHWESTERN JONES AND SOUTHERN LINN COUNTIES... At 525 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Palisades-Kepler State Park, or 9 miles southeast of Cedar Rapids, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Cedar Rapids, Mechanicsville, Mount Vernon, Lisbon, Fairfax, Ely, Swisher, Shueyville, Bertram, Martelle, Morley, Cou Falls, Palisades-Kepler State Park, and Cedar Rapids Municipal Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
